phrs.translation: 顺从地, 服从地, 的意思

sentences.sentence: He further informed that the second round of consultations was likely to begin soon and expressed optimism that both the countries would act amenably to sort out all the trade barriers.
sentences.translation: 他进一步表示，第二轮会议会马上召开，并看好两国相互配合取消贸各项贸易壁垒的行动。
